mapper.sql: user_info_id, user_tel, user_provinces, user_address, user_id, user_name

user_info_id,
user_tel,
user_provinces,
user_address,
user_id,
user_name,

mapper.update:
update user_info
user_tel = #{userTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_provinces = #{userProvinces,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_info_id = #{userInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_info set user_tel = #{userTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_provinces = #{userProvinces,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_info_id = #{userInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_info_id from user_info where user_name = #{userName}
